pages.text:
April 2023 County of Marin EMS GPC 12
MULTI-CASUALTY INCIDENT (MCI)
Indication
Any incident with multiple patients may indicate the use of the County Multi-Casualty
Incident (MCI) Plan.
Initiate the MCI for scene management
Request additional resources
as needed
• Evaluate each patient using Simple Triage And
Rapid Treatment (START)
• Triage and tag patients into the appropriate
category (Deceased, Immediate, Delayed, Minor)
